title: Getting Started
text: current version roadtrafficdeaths can installed GitHub : Next, libraries used vignette loaded. package loads data.table object called rtdeaths, recommended install load data.table package well.

title: Getting Started
text: example, use rtdeaths dataset extract annual quantity road traffic deaths Brazil, 1996 2021.
code: year_deaths <- rtdeaths[, .N, by = ano_ocorrencia][!is.na(ano_ocorrencia)]  plot(   year_deaths$ano_ocorrencia,   year_deaths$N,   xlab = "Year",   ylab = "Road traffic deaths",   type = "b" )

title: Authors and Citation
text: Pedro Augusto Borges Santos. Author, maintainer. João Pedro Melani Saraiva. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Santos PAB, Saraiva JPM (2023). roadtrafficdeaths: Road Traffic Deaths Data Brazil. https://pabsantos.github.io/roadtrafficdeaths/, https://github.com/pabsantos/roadtrafficdeaths.
code: @Manual{,   title = {roadtrafficdeaths: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil},   author = {Pedro Augusto Borges Santos and João Pedro Melani Saraiva},   year = {2023},   note = {https://pabsantos.github.io/roadtrafficdeaths/, https://github.com/pabsantos/roadtrafficdeaths}, }

what: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: goal roadtrafficdeaths provide dataset death certificates road traffic crashes happened Brazil, Brazilian Ministry Health. dataset provided data.table format. check variable, use ?rtdeaths.

title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: can install current version roadtrafficdeaths GitHub :

title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
code: library(roadtrafficdeaths)  str(rtdeaths) #> Classes 'data.table' and 'data.frame':   936969 obs. of  18 variables: #>  $ cod_modal          : chr  "V8" "V8" "V8" "V8" ... #>  $ modal_vitima       : chr  "Outros" "Outros" "Outros" "Outros" ... #>  $ data_ocorrencia    : Date, format: "1996-01-27" "1996-01-11" ... #>  $ ano_ocorrencia     : int  1996 1996 1996 1996 1996 1996 1996 1996 1996 1996 ... #>  $ idade_vitima       : num  27 20 19 41 41 36 17 63 55 7 ... #>  $ faixa_etaria_vitima: Factor w/ 17 levels "0 a 4 anos","5 a 9 anos",..: 6 5 4 9 9 8 4 13 12 2 ... #>  $ sexo_vitima        : chr  "Masculino" "Masculino" "Masculino" "Masculino" ... #>  $ escolaridade_vitima: chr  "Nenhuma" NA NA NA ... #>  $ raca_vitima        : chr  NA NA NA NA ... #>  $ ocup_cbo_vitima    : chr  "55100" "00200" "00600" "00200" ... #>  $ cod_municipio_ocor : chr  "110010" "110020" "110010" "110010" ... #>  $ nome_regiao_ocor   : chr  "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" ... #>  $ cod_municipio_res  : chr  "110010" "110020" "110020" "110020" ... #>  $ nome_regiao_res    : chr  "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" ... #>  $ nome_uf_ocor       : chr  "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" ... #>  $ nome_municipio_ocor: chr  "Guajará-Mirim" "Porto Velho" "Guajará-Mirim" "Guajará-Mirim" ... #>  $ nome_uf_res        : chr  "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" ... #>  $ nome_municipio_res : chr  "Guajará-Mirim" "Porto Velho" "Porto Velho" "Porto Velho" ... #>  - attr(*, ".internal.selfref")=<externalptr>

what: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
text: Death certificates road traffic crashes. Data Brazilian Ministry Health, 1996 2021. variables encoded Brazilian Portuguese.

title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
text: data.table 936,969 rows 18 columns: cod_modal ICD-10 code main cause death modal_vitima Mode transport victim road crash data_ocorrencia Date death ISO 8601 format ano_ocorrencia Year death idade_vitima Age years victim faixa_etaria_vitima Age range victim sexo_vitima Sex victim escolaridade_vitima Education victim raca_vitima Race victim ocup_cbo_vitima Ocupation victim, based CBO code cod_municipio_ocor City death occurrence, based IBGE code nome_regiao_ocor Brazilian region death occurred cod_municipio_res City residence victim, based IBGE code nome_regiao_res Brazilian region victim residence address nome_uf_ocor Name state death occurred nome_municipio_ocor Name city death occurred nome_uf_res Name state victim residence address nome_municipio_res Name city victim residence address

title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
